summary: The financial services industry is increasingly dependent on technology. We looked at factors affecting women's participation in STEM degree programs and their subsequent interest in financial services industry careers. We found that women's interest in STEM is affected by the presence of role models, access to resources, and their sense of belonging. Some financial services firms are trying to increase women's interest in STEM by...
title: Financial Services Industry: Factors Affecting Careers for Women with STEM Degrees
topics: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics education
